This is a great fresh cocktail. This makes a jug containing around 4 servings.
Ingredients: 1/2 pint organic pressed apple juice 1/2 pint fiery ginger beer 8 shots good quality vodka juice of half a lime sprig of mint 4 thin slices of fresh ginger 4 wedges of lime 4 thin slices of apple
Put it all in a big jug and stir.
Fill 4 glasses with ice. Pour in the glasses. Put glass gently to lips, drink. Repeat several times. Fall over.
